Title: Gordy
Writer: Jay Sommers (story), Dick Chevillat (story), Leslie Stevens (screenplay), Jay Sommers (screenplay), Dick Chevillat (screenplay)
Actors: Doug Stone, Kristy Young, James Donadio, Deborah Hobart
Plot: This is the story of a talking cute piglet named Gordy, who gets involved in a big quest to save his family from the slaughterhouse, where no pigs have ever returned. And it's all up to him to find and save them before they get turned into sausage!
